summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 HEARTLAND CYCLONE TRAILER EQUIPPED WITH DELTA HI-RUN TIRES, SIZE ST235/80/R16. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE FRONT DRIVER SIDE TIRE FAILED AND EXPLODED. THE FRONT DRIVER SIDE PANELS OF THE TRAILER WERE DESTROYED. THE BRAKE LIGHT WIRING WAS ALSO DAMAGED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE THEY STATED THAT THE FAILURE WITH TIRE WAS DUE TO TREAD SEPARATION.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE FOR THE VEHICLE WAS 5,000. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE OF THE TIRE WAS 800. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
